body:
CRI was disabled temporarily in hollow nodes by #41460 because hollow nodes were failing to create pods.

We need to fix this and enable CRI for hollow nodes.
```

```

@Random-Liu did a quick triage and found that the container ids used by the fake docker client are not valid checkpoint key names:https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41460#issuecomment-279950446

/cc @freehan @Random-Liu @wojtek-t

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Node.
labels.name: sig/node

title: Enable CRI in hollow nodes for kubemark
